owner_id.description: https://t.me/MissRose_bot in MissRose, type /id and put here

is_team_drive.description: If your folder is in team drive, put True

authorized_chats.description: Authorized chat ids split by space

use_service_accounts.description: If you use service accounts, put True

accounts_zip_url.description: If you want to use service accounts, put direct download link for service accounts (accounts.zip) named

mega_api_key.description: If you want to use pro mega, get this from mega.nz/sdk

mega_email_id.description: If you use mega, put your email

mega_password.description: If you use mega, put your password

mega_limit.description: To limit the size of Mega download (leave space between number and unit, available units are (gb or GB, tb or TB), Examples: 100 gb, 100 GB, 10 tb, 10 TB

clone_limit.description: To limit the size of Google Drive folder/file which you can clone (leave space between number and unit, Available units are (gb or GB, tb or TB), Examples: 100 gb, 100 GB, 10 tb, 10 TB

token_pickle_url.description: Required for authentication, put your direct download link here
